title: The Toronto Symphony Orchestra covers Drake’s ‘Know Yourself’ and it’s great: watch
content:
The Polaris Music Prize usually features acts from the pop, rock, hip-hop and singer-songwriter realms, but at last night's gala, one of Canada's most renowned symphony orchestras took on a track by one of Canada's hugest hip-hop artists. 
 
The Toronto Symphony Orchestra performed Drake's hit "Know Yourself," and it was one of the most memorable moments of the night.
